name: nodejs-opensearch-backend
headerComment: This package.json defines backend dependencies and scripts for development, migrations, seeding, and testing.

bottomExplanation.responsibility: Declares backend runtime and dev tooling so the project can run, migrate, seed, and test.
bottomExplanation.keySyntax: The scripts section maps npm commands to CLI commands like sequelize-cli and jest.
bottomExplanation.commonMistakes: Forgetting sequelize-cli or mysql2 causes migration and DB connection failures.
